catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 942
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: pitcher with very narrow neck with decorative disk within neck, and narrower, needle-like mouth; short, squat, segmented spout with loose cap; thin incised lines around soft shoulder; green patina
title: Water vessel (Kundika)
